resources.name: List products
resources.description:
lista todos lo productos

### **Body Request**
```JSON
```

### Authentication `true`

**Format**
```
Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOjMsImlhdCI6MTYzMTg0MzYwNywiZXhwIjoxNjM1NDQzNjA3fQ.1x6ReeuOvbAnXj9PZyE-CtQqtapPIaDSrUGXUUrMZnk
```

### Params `False`



### Permisos

* **`Admin`** **Sí**

* **`Client`** **Sí**


### Responses Format

* **[200] OK**
```JSON
[
  {
    "id": 3,
    "name": "Pizza",
    "category": "Food",
    "price": 5,
    "quantity_stock": 40
  },
  {
    "id": 5,
    "name": "Crash",
    "category": "Games",
    "price": 100,
    "quantity_stock": 40
  }
]
```

* **[401] Unauthorized**

```JSON
{
  "statusCode": 401,
  "error": "Unauthorized",
  "message": "Invalid token format"
}
```

resources.name: Create purchase
resources.description:
Cualquier usuario puede hacer una compra solo indicando el id de los productos y su cantidad

### **Body Request**
```JSON
[
	{
		"productId": 1,
		"quantity": 1
	}
]
```

### Authentication `true`

**Format**
```
Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOjMsImlhdCI6MTYzMTg0MzYwNywiZXhwIjoxNjM1NDQzNjA3fQ.1x6ReeuOvbAnXj9PZyE-CtQqtapPIaDSrUGXUUrMZnk
```

### Params `false`

### Permisos

* **`Admin`** **Sí**

* **`Client`** **Sí**


### Responses Format

* **[200] OK**
```JSON
{
  "total": 300,
  "user": {
    "id": 4,
    "firts_name": "Juan",
    "last_name": "Agudelo",
    "email": "client@gmail.com",
    "password": "$2a$10$K693LlF.nb9YtIIxvZ2nAuU8KWNp2p.RzZzpVycYvddOpe9K0xpoa",
    "money": 700
  },
  "id": 2,
  "purchased_at": "2021-09-17T02:02:43.281Z"
}
```

* **[401] Unauthorized**

```JSON
{
  "statusCode": 401,
  "error": "Unauthorized",
  "message": "Invalid token format"
}
```

* **[403] Forbidden**

```JSON
{
  "statusCode": 403,
  "error": "Forbidden",
  "message": "Forbidden",
}
```

resources.name: Update one purchase by id
resources.description:

### **Body Request**
```JSON
[
	{
		"productId": 1,

	}
```

### Authentication `true`

```
Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOjMsImlhdCI6MTYzMTg0MzYwNywiZXhwIjoxNjM1NDQzNjA3fQ.1x6ReeuOvbAnXj9PZyE-CtQqtapPIaDSrUGXUUrMZnk
```

```JSON
{
  "id": 2,
  "purchased_at": "2021-09-17T02:02:43.281Z",
  "total": 0,
  "purchases_products": [
    {
      "id": 4,
      "product": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Celular",
        "category": "Technology",
        "price": 300,
        "quantity_stock": 37
      }

  ],

    "id": 4,

    "last_name": "Agudelo",
    "email": "client@gmail.com",

    "money": 700,
    "role": {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Client"
    }
  }
}
```

```JSON
{
  "statusCode": 401,
```

resources.name: [ME] Delete user logged
resources.description:
Borra al usuario actualmente logeado

**Body Request**
```JSON
```

### Authentication `true`

**Format**
```
Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOjMsImlhdCI6MTYzMTg0MzYwNywiZXhwIjoxNjM1NDQzNjA3fQ.1x6ReeuOvbAnXj9PZyE-CtQqtapPIaDSrUGXUUrMZnk
```

### Permisos

**`Admin`** Puede eliminar usuarios y asi mismo

**`Client`** Puede eliminar su propia informacion


### Responses Format

**[200] OK**
```JSON
true
```

**[400] Bad Request**

*User doesn't exist*
```JSON
{
  "error": "The User does not exists"
}
```

resources.name: [ME] Update user logged
resources.description:
Actualiza la info del usuario actualmente logeado

**Body Request**
```JSON
{
	"money": 50000	
}
```

### Authentication `true`

**Format**
```
Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOjMsImlhdCI6MTYzMTg0MzYwNywiZXhwIjoxNjM1NDQzNjA3fQ.1x6ReeuOvbAnXj9PZyE-CtQqtapPIaDSrUGXUUrMZnk
```

### Permisos

**`Admin`** Puede actualizar asi mismo

**`Client`** Puede actualziar su propia informacion


### Responses Format

**[201] OK**
```JSON
{
  "id": 2,
  "firts_name": "Juan",
  "last_name": "Agudelo",
  "email": "client@gmail.com",
  "password": "$2a$10$vbGmuirHnqlZvfpsjPAAzOnbzJHk0KNoRCV80/J4nbEYFPy.kiw5a",
  "money": 50000,
  "role": {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Client"
  },
  "purchases": []
}
```

**[400] Bad Request**

*User doesn't exist*
```JSON
{
  "error": "The User does not exists"
}
```


### Authentication `true`

**Format**
```
Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOjMsImlhdCI6MTYzMTg0MzYwNywiZXhwIjoxNjM1NDQzNjA3fQ.1x6ReeuOvbAnXj9PZyE-CtQqtapPIaDSrUGXUUrMZnk
```

### Params `True`

* `userId`


### Permisos

* **`Admin`** Puede eliminar la info de un usuario por su id en la DB

* **`Client`** **No**


### Responses Format

* **[200] OK**
```JSON
true
```

* **[403] Forbidden**

```JSON
{
  "statusCode": 403,
  "error": "Forbidden",
  "message": "Forbidden",
}
```

resources.name: Sing Up
resources.description:
Registro de usuarios con el **`role: Client` **

**Body Request**
```JSON
{
	"firts_name": "name",
	"last_name": "apellido",
	"email": "correo@gmail.com",
	"password": "password",
	"money": 1000
}
```
Todas las variables son obligatorias, a excepsión de **`money`** la cual es opcional.

### Responses Format

**[200] OK**
```JSON
{
  "msg": "User created successfully"
}
```

**[400] Bad Request**

*User already exist*
```JSON
{
  "error": "The user already exists",
  "info": {
    "email": "client@gmail.com"
  }
}
```

*User didn't send any mandatory variable*

```JSON
{
  "msg": "Please. Send your personal info"
}
```

resources.name: Sing Up Admin
resources.description:
Registro de usuarios con el **`role: Admin` **

**Body Request**
```JSON
{
	"firts_name": "name",
	"last_name": "apellido",
	"email": "correo@gmail.com",
	"password": "password",
	"money": 1000
}
```
Todas las variables son obligatorias, a excepsión de **`money`** la cual es opcional.

### Responses Format

**[200] OK**
```JSON
{
  "msg": "User created successfully"
}
```

**[400] Bad Request**

*User already exist*
```JSON
{
  "error": "The user already exists",
  "info": {
    "email": "admin@gmail.com"
  }
}
```

*User didn't send any mandatory variable*

```JSON
{
  "msg": "Please. Send your personal info"
}
```

resources.name: Sing In
resources.description:
Inicio de sesión de **cualquier tipo** de usuario

**Body Request**
```JSON
{
	"email": "client@gmail.com",
	"password": "client"
}
```
Todas las variables son obligatorias

### Responses Format

**[200] OK**
```JSON
{
  "token": "asdflnaslxcnlasnxcknqaDHANSXCNAJDOASCOAJSKXNA"
}
```

**[400] Bad Request**

*User doesn't exist*
```JSON
{
  "error": "The User does not exists"
}
```
